name: Artisan Quarter
description: A neighborhood filled with workshops and craft guilds; adventurers can commission custom items, learn specialized skills, or find rare materials from master craftsmen.
atmosphere: The rhythmic clang of hammers on anvils echoes through narrow streets. The air is thick with the scent of burning coal, fresh wood shavings, and hot metal. Colorful guild banners flutter above doorways, and the sound of apprentices learning their trades fills the air.
